item.title: Hardware - Electrical Engineer
item.description:
Hardware - Electrical Engineer

Cabana Blockchain is a hardware company at its core. We are looking for Electrical Engineers to join our team and help us create devices that go into people’s homes.

Responsibilities:

  • Work with our hardware team to design and test embedded systems
  • Work with our contract manufacturers overseas to mass produce our devices

Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in electrical engineering or firmware engineering
  • 5+ years of work experience
  • Capable of designing an embedded system at all stages of the work flow
  • Circuit design and simulation using SPICE tools
  • PCB design using industry-standard tools
  • Intimate knowledge of how microcontrollers work

To learn how to apply, please see our Careers page.

Cabana Blockchain provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability or genetics.

item.title: Hardware - Firmware Engineer
item.description:
Hardware - Firmware Engineer

At Cabana Blockchain, firmware is what gives our devices intelligence. We are looking for Firmware Engineers to join our team and help us create devices that go into people’s homes.

Responsibilities:

  • Work with our hardware team to design and program embedded systems
  • Work with our software team to bring our devices online

Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in electrical, computer, or firmware engineering
  • 5+ years of work experience
  • Experience programming embedded systems in C/C++
  • Programming drivers for microcontroller peripherals
  • Using real-time operating systems
  • Consuming APIs on embedded systems

To learn how to apply, please see our Careers page.

Cabana Blockchain provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability or genetics.

item.title: Hardware - Mechanical Engineer
item.description:
Hardware - Mechanical Engineer

Cabana Blockchain is a hardware company at its core. We are looking for Mechanical Engineers to join our team and help us create devices that go into people’s homes.

Responsibilities:

  • Work with our hardware team to design and test IoT electronics enclosures and devices
  • Work with our contract manufacturers overseas to mass produce our devices

Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in mechanical engineering
  • 5+ years of work experience
  • Capable of designing all mechanical components of an embedded device
  • Experience with industry-standard CAD tools
  • Knowledge of GD&T, VSA, DFMEA and other engineering processes
  • Experience designing tooling for plastic injection moulded parts
  • Experience with failure analysis and QA

To learn how to apply, please see our Careers page.

Cabana Blockchain provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability or genetics.

item.title: Software - Backend Developer
item.description:
Software - Backend Developer

Cabana Blockchain uses software to run all of its devices. We are looking for Backend Developers to join our team and help us create devices that go into people’s homes.

Responsibilities:

  • Work with our software team to write the code that makes our devices work
  • Work with our firmware engineers to help bridge the gap between software and hardware
  • Develop our blockchain technology

Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in software engineering or computer science
  • 5+ years of work experience
  • Capable of designing APIs and software that runs on embedded devices
  • Experience with C++, Python, SQL, web application development
  • Experience with distributed computing / consensus algorithms
  • Knowledge of Test-driven Development and Linux servers
  • Able to learn blockchain technology

To learn how to apply, please see our Careers page.

Cabana Blockchain provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability or genetics.

item.title: Software - Frontend Developer
item.description:
Software - Frontend Developer

Cabana Blockchain uses software to run all of its devices. We are looking for Frontend Developers to join our team and help us create devices that go into people’s homes.

Responsibilities:

  • Work with our software team to write the code that makes our devices work and allows users to control them
  • Develop our blockchain technology

Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in software engineering or computer science
  • 5+ years of work experience
  • Capable of consuming APIs and designing web applications
  • Experience with Python, Javascript, React, Redux, and web sockets
  • Experience with distributed computing / consensus algorithms
  • Knowledge of Test-driven Development and Linux servers
  • Able to learn blockchain technology

To learn how to apply, please see our Careers page.

Cabana Blockchain provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability or genetics.
